snippet: A spokesman for the Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia, or FARC, said the rebels were optimistic about coming to terms with the government, despite the obstacles.
abstract: Marco Leon Calarca, spokesman for the Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia, or FARC, says the rebels are optimistic about coming to terms with the government, despite Pres Juan Manuel Santos's rejection of a proposed cease-fire.
lead_paragraph: A spokesman for the Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia, or FARC, said the rebels were optimistic about coming to terms with the government, despite the obstacles.

headline.seo: FARC Says Colombia Cease-Fire Refusal Won’t Halt Peace Talks
headline.main: Colombia’s Cease-Fire Refusal Won’t Halt Peace Talks, Rebels Say
headline.print_headline: Colombia’s Cease-Fire Refusal Won’t Halt Peace Talks, Rebels Say
